definition: a prediction about how something (as the weather) will develop, judge to be probable
details:
noun
- a prediction about how something (as the weather) will develop
= synonyms: prognosis
verb
- judge to be probable
= synonyms: figure
- indicate by signs
= synonyms: presage, omen, augur, auspicate, bode, portend, prognosticate, betoken, foreshadow, foretell, prefigure, predict
- predict in advance
= synonyms: calculate
